description: An entry in the HMP reference genome project catalog.

hmp_id.title: The HMP project catalog ID for this project.

organism_name.title: The name of the organism sequenced in this project.

domain.title: The taxonomic domain of the organism sequenced in this project.

gold.description: A container for GOLD related values.

genus.title: The GOLD genus of the organism sequenced.

species.title: The GOLD species of the organism sequenced.

strain.title: The GOLD strain of the organism sequenced.

all_body_sites.title: The body sites from which samples were collected for this project.

ncbi.description: A container for NCBI related values pertaining to project catalog entries.

project_name.title: The name, if any, under which this project is registered with NCBI.

taxon_id.title: The NCBI ID for the taxon of the organism sequenced in this project.

superkingdom.title: The NCBI superkingdom of the organism sequenced in this project.

phylum.title: The NCBI phylum of the organism sequenced in this project.

class.title: The NCBI class of the organism sequenced in this project.

order.title: The NCBI order of the organism sequenced in this project.

family.title: The NCBI family of the organism sequenced in this project.

genus.title: The NCBI genus of the organism sequenced in this project.

species.title: The NCBI species of the organism sequenced in this project.

submission_status.title: The current status of this project's NCBI submission.
enum: 0. project has not been submitted to NCBI
1. project submitted to NCBI and waiting for project id
6. annotation (and sequence) public on NCBI site

project_id.title: The NCBI ID for this project.

16s_accession.title: The NCBI 16s Accession ID for this project.

all_body_subsites.title: The body subsites from which samples were collected for this project.

hmp_isolation_body_site.title: The body site from which this project's sample was isolated.

hmp_isolation_body_subsite.title: The body subsite from which this project's sample was isolated.

hmp_body_product.title: The body product from which this project's sample was isolated.

isolation_source.title: The source of the DNA analyzed in this project.

project_status.title: The current status of this project.

dna_received.title: Whether DNA has been received for this project.

current_finishing_level.title: The current finishing level for this project's sequence.

finishing_goal.title: The intended final finishing level for this project's sequence.

date_dna_received.title: The date on which DNA to be sequenced for this project was received.

date_sequencing_begins.title: The date on which sequencing begins for this project.

draft_sequencing_completion_date.title: The date on which draft sequencing for this project is complete.

genbank_id.title: The GenBank ID for this project's master record.

gene_count.title: The number of genes found in this project's sequence data.

contig_count.title: The number of contigs found in this project's sequence data.

reads_count.title: The number of nucleotide reads found in this project's sequence data.

size_kb.title: The size in Kb (kilobasepairs) of this project's sequence.

gc_content.title: The GC percentage of this project's sequence.

img_hmp_id.title: The IMG/HMP database ID for this project.

greengenes_id.title: The Greengenes ID for this project.

sequence_read_archive_id.title: The Sequence Read Archive (SRA) ID for this project.

homd_id.title: The Human Oral Microbiome Database (HOMD) ID for this project.

sequencing_center.title: The name of the sequencing center which sequenced this project's genome.

sequencing_country.title: The country in which this project's genome was sequenced.

funding_source.title: The organization or grant which funded this project.

hmp_isolate_selection_source.title: The source providing the isolate sample for this project.

strain_repository_id.title: The ID of the isolate in the strain repository from which it was sourced.

temperature_range.title: The temperature range in which the organism can survive.

optimum_temperature.title: The optimal temperature at which to culture the organism (Centigrade).

sequencing_method.title: The sequencing method used in the project.

assembly_methods.title: The assembly method(s) used in the project.

coverage.title: The average depth of sequencing coverage.

gene_calling_methods.title: The gene calling method(s) used in the project.

gram_stain.title: Whether the organism is Gram-positive or Gram-negative.

type_strain.title: Whether this strain is the organism's type strain.

isolation_comments.title: Comment regarding the source of isolate or the isolation site.

availability_comments.title: Comment regarding sample availability of the isolate used in this project.

project_comments.title: General comments further describing the project.

addition_date.title: Date of project addition to the HMP reference genome catalog.

last_modification_date.title: Date when the project's HMP reference genome catalog entry was last modified.

host_gender.title: Gender of the host from which this project's sample was isolated.

visit_number.title: The number of the subject's clinic visit on which this sample was isolated.

replicate_number.title: The replicate number of this sample.

project_type.title: The type of this sequencing project.
